4585.verse: لِّيَغْفِرَ|That may forgive|133|142|4546$لَكَ|for you|67|84|323$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|70|123$مَا|what|53|70|262$تَقَدَّمَ|preceded|81|98|15854$مِن|of|50|67|53$ذَنۢبِكَ|your fault|84|101|15855$وَمَا|and what|82|91|46$تَأَخَّرَ|will follow|83|98|1793$وَيُتِمَّ|and complete|109|140|15856$نِعْمَتَهُۥ|His favor|89|120|4782$عَلَيْكَ|upon you|81|112|2245$وَيَهْدِيَكَ|and guide you|113|144|15857$صِرَٲطًا|(to) a Path|96|111|11206$مُّسْتَقِيمًا|Straight,|94|94|6024$

4589.verse: وَيُعَذِّبَ|And He (may) punish|158|169|13988$ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ|the hypocrite men|141|162|4122$وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ|and the hypocrite women|189|210|7720$وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ|and the polytheist men|173|184|14183$وَٱلْمُشْرِكَـٰتِ|and the polytheist women,|197|214|14184$ٱلظَّآنِّينَ|who assume|101|136|15863$بِٱللَّهِ|about Allah|94|129|79$ظَنَّ|an assumption|115|150|3404$ٱلسَّوْءِ‌ۚ|evil.|78|96|7851$عَلَيْهِمْ|Upon them|91|119|22$دَآئِرَةُ|(is) a turn|87|144|7850$ٱلسَّوْءِ‌ۖ|(of) evil,|78|134|7851$وَغَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ|and Allah`s wrath is|153|210|4327$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|118|22$وَلَعَنَهُمْ|and He has cursed them|181|206|15864$وَأَعَدَّ|and prepared|107|156|4329$لَهُمْ|for them|76|126|98$جَهَنَّمَ‌ۖ|Hell,|69|118|2655$وَسَآءَتْ|and evil|94|119|4366$مَصِيرًا|(is the) destination.|152|152|4367$

4584.verse: Indeed, We have given you, [O Muhammad], a clear conquest

4585.verse: That Allah may forgive for you what preceded of your sin and what will follow and complete His favor upon you and guide you to a straight path

4586.verse: And [that] Allah may aid you with a mighty victory.

4587.verse: It is He who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the believers that they would increase in faith along with their [present] faith. And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth, and ever is Allah Knowing and Wise.

4588.verse: [And] that He may admit the believing men and the believing women to gardens beneath which rivers flow to abide therein eternally and remove from them their misdeeds - and ever is that, in the sight of Allah, a great attainment -

4589.verse: And [that] He may punish the hypocrite men and hypocrite women, and the polytheist men and polytheist women - those who assume about Allah an assumption of evil nature. Upon them is a misfortune of evil nature; and Allah has become angry with them and has cursed them and prepared for them Hell, and evil it is as a destination.

4590.verse: And to Allah belong the soldiers of the heavens and the earth. And ever is Allah Exalted in Might and Wise.

4591.verse: Indeed, We have sent you as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner

4592.verse: That you [people] may believe in Allah and His Messenger and honor him and respect the Prophet and exalt Allah morning and afternoon.
